title: [Emerald Forest, Junction]
description: Two paths cross, and the forest opens slightly to allow for a small clearing.  Moonlight floods the space, and a few wildflowers have made a stand in the very center.  A firefly bobs and weaves through the perfumed air like a drunken lamplighter.

Two paths cross, and the forest opens slightly to allow for a small clearing.  Sunlight floods the space, and a few wildflowers have made a stand in the very center.  A lone butterfly rests on a broad leaf, its sapphire wings twitching gently in the silken air.
paths: Obvious paths: east, southeast, southwest, up
